Instrumentation Communication and Signal Conditioning Standards
Introduction
Modern refinery instrumentation relies on both analogue and digital communication networks. Signal conditioning, intrinsic safety barriers and industrial communication protocols ensure accurate and safe data transfer from field devices to control systems. These standards integrate ISA 50, IEC 61158 for Fieldbus and IEEE 802.3 for Ethernet.
Applicable Standards
IEC 61158 / IEC 61784: Fieldbus protocols (FOUNDATION Fieldbus, Profibus).
HART Protocol Specification: hybrid analogue/digital communication over 4–20 mA.
ISA 50 / IEC 61804: Electronic Device Description Language (EDDL) and FDI.
IEC 60079‑11: Intrinsically safe apparatus.
IEEE 802.3 / 802.11: Industrial Ethernet and wireless communications.
Communication Technologies
